Um dia, ao sair de seu trabalho entediante, Fausto, ÃƒÂ© abordado por uma mulher misteriosa. Ela faz a ele uma proposta tentadora: VENDER partes de sua ALMA em troca de ter todos os seus DESEJOS realizados.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

SOUL GAMBLER is an interactive comic based on Goethe's play Faust, written in the nineteenth century. The game is an adaptation for the present this masterpiece and puts you in the role of Faust. A young accountant whose fate is about to be changed forever. 

One day, out of their tedious work, Faust, is approached by a mysterious woman. She makes him a tempting offer: SELL your SOUL parts in exchange for having all their wishes fulfilled. 

Now it's up to YOU to decide their destiny!
